Standard.Name: The Treasure of Hassan Ben Sahid 1.1.1.1.1

English.Text:
One of the officers makes the map talk. She is an educated woman, a graduate of a fine old university, who snuck into the navy by shaving her head. "Arabic," she says, "but here is written left to right, like a mirror image." It reads:
"Hassan Ben Sahid breathes his last,
Upon you these spoils fairly won,
As I enter that lavish garden,
may your own thirst be quenched."
